programme.title: Finding Love In Sisters
programme.desc: When her mother dies, Esperanza returns to Sisters, Oregon and reunites with her sisters.

programme.title: Just For Showmance
programme.desc: When Tara Thompson’s presenting career begins to stall her PR team encourage her go on a TV show to marry a man she’s never met, her ‘perfect match’ Joe. Tara reluctantly agrees, however goes on secret mission to track down Joe to explain the marriage is just for show.

programme.title: My One True Love
programme.desc: When 2 of the 3 things a fortune teller predicts come true, Ali wonders about the 3rd - finding true love with a man named John. Drawn to a fireman whose name isn't John, does she trust destiny or her heart?

programme.title: Love in Tahiti
programme.desc: Brielle has always believed the ocean floor is full of treasures just waiting to be found. Over the years she has dived to find coins, lost jewelry and more in the waters of Tahiti. Instead of profiting from them, she loves reuniting people with their lost valuables. When she finds a class ring and returns it to Marcus, a handsome US Navy serviceman, Brielle soon discovers what has been missing in her life – a treasure of the heart.

programme.title: Christmas Wreaths and Ribbons
programme.desc: A wreathmaker slips on ice and injures her arm which puts her holiday wreath deliveries in jeopardy until a selfless neighbor steps up to keep her business afloat.

programme.title: Destined At Christmas
programme.desc: Two people meet on Black Friday, get separated, and yearn to reunite—if only they knew each other’s last names and numbers. Can destiny help them find each other by Christmas?

programme.title: Singing With Angels
programme.desc: Faced with a crossroads in her life, Aubrey reflects on her experiences in joining the Mormon Tabernacle Choir and how they have strengthened her and her family through their challenges.

programme.title: Finding Love In Sisters
programme.desc: When her mother dies, Esperanza returns to Sisters, Oregon and reunites with her sisters.
